data.lyric:
[ti:Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!]
[ar:Dean Martin]
[al:The Christmas Crooner Collection]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow! (Remastered 2002) - Dean Martin (迪安·马丁)
[00:07.70]Oh the weather outside is frightful
[00:10.54]
[00:11.17]But the fire is so delightful
[00:14.10]
[00:14.69]And since we've no place to go
[00:17.21]
[00:18.15]Let it snow let it snow let it snow
[00:20.90]
[00:21.76]Man it doesn't show signs of stopping
[00:24.37]
[00:25.22]And I brought some corn for popping
[00:28.03]
[00:29.13]The lights are turned we down low
[00:31.47]
[00:32.25]Let it snow let it snow
[00:35.27]
[00:36.19]When we finally kiss goodnight
[00:38.43]
[00:39.52]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[00:42.31]
[00:43.13]But if you really hold me tight
[00:45.96]
[00:46.61]All the way home I'll be warm
[00:49.08]
[00:49.96]And the fire is slowing dying
[00:52.67]
[00:53.64]And my dear we're still good-byeing
[00:56.29]
[00:57.14]But as long as you'd love me so
[00:59.54]
[01:00.54]Let it snow let it snow and snow
[01:03.32]
[01:18.75]When we finally kiss goodnight
[01:21.05]
[01:22.06]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[01:24.80]
[01:25.62]But if you really grab me tight
[01:28.21]
[01:29.03]All the way home I'll be warm
[01:31.73]
[01:32.52]Oh the fire is slowing dying
[01:35.20]
[01:36.00]And my dear we're still good-byeing
[01:38.80]
[01:39.64]But as long as you'd love me so
[01:42.11]
[01:43.06]Let it snow let it snow let it snow
